In-N-Out Burger: A Behind-The-Counter Look at the Fast-Food Chain That Breaks All the Rules
by Stacy Perman
About this title: Perman investigates the inside story of the renegade, family-owned burger chain that evokes a passionate following unlike any other. 8-page photo insert.
Note: This is a general synopsis. Each listing is described below.
